The post: s Hindi caption translated to English as: "The country will not tolerate such disrespect. Facebook's Ankhi Das made tri-colour cake and cut that."
Ankhi Das is Facebook: s public policy head for India, South and Central Asia, and has been in the news for allegedly pursuing policies favorable to India's ruling party.
Reverse image and keyword searches on Go: Sangeeta Bahadur, cutting a cake in celebration of India's Independence Day on August 15, 2020.
